introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Lqani.ma. We understand the sensitive nature of our mission - helping families reunite with their missing loved ones. Your privacy and the security of your personal information are of utmost importance to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, protect, and share information when you use our platform. By using Lqani.ma, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: To provide our services effectively, we collect the following types of information:

items.personal: Account Information: Name, email address, phone number, and password when you register
items.photos: Missing Person Data: Photos, physical descriptions, last known location, and circumstances of disappearance
items.device: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, and cookies for security and service improvement
items.usage: Usage Information: How you interact with our platform, search queries, and features you use

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: Your information is used solely to fulfill our mission of reuniting families:

items.matching: Photo Matching: Using advanced technology to compare uploaded photos and identify potential matches
items.communication: Notifications: Alerting you about potential sightings, matches, or important updates about your case
items.improvement: Platform Enhancement: Improving our matching algorithms and user experience based on anonymized data
items.security: Safety & Verification: Preventing fraud, verifying reports, and ensuring the platform is used for legitimate purposes

dataProtection.title: Data Protection & Security
dataProtection.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your sensitive information. All data is encrypted using SSL/TLS during transmission and AES-256 encryption at rest. Access to personal data is strictly limited to authorized personnel. We conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments. Our servers are hosted in secure, SOC 2 compliant data centers. We never sell your personal information to third parties.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have full control over your personal information:

items.access: Access: Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you
items.correction: Correction: Update or correct any inaccurate information in your profile
items.deletion: Deletion: Request permanent deletion of your account and associated data
items.portability: Portability: Receive your data in a portable format to transfer elsewhere

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, want to exercise your rights, or have concerns about how your data is handled, please reach out to our privacy team.
